Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.notification

At a high level the Notification SDK supports the following functionality: Receiving push notifications via GCM (in future to be expanded to SMS, and custom socket channel)

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INotificationManager
    Methods in this interface provide convenient job creation methods that provide easy access to the underlying INotificationService functionality.
    INotificationService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the Paloma Mobile Platform Notification Service RESTful API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventEchoNotificationRequested
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) whenever a Notification for the client application is requested.
    EventGcmRegistrationIdUpdated
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) whenever a GCM registration id for the client application has been updated on the server.
    EventNotificationReceived
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) whenever a Notification for the client application is received on any channel (GCM, SMS etc.) The event contains either the notification on success or throwable on failure.
    GcmRegistrationIdResponse
    Response to Gcm Registration Id update request.
    GcmUtils  
    JobPostEchoNotification
    Convenience wrapper around INotificationService.postEchoNotification(String, Long, Notification) Once this job is completed (with success or failure) it posts EventEchoNotificationRequested on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()).
    JobUserUpdateGcmRegistrationId
    The default provided implementation of the INotificationManager runs this job whenever required to ensure the GcmRegistrationId is up to date on the back-end.
    Notification
    Class Notification represents the detailed content information about a notification received through any notification channel (eg: GCM, SMS etc.) The type and recipientId fields are required and will be populated with valid values while the other fields may be null.
    NotificationGcmListenerService
    Handles incoming Gcm notifications by publishing EventNotificationReceived with notification contents.
    NotificationInstanceIDListenerService
    Overrides NotificationInstanceIDListenerService.onTokenRefresh() to add a new JobUserUpdateGcmRegistrationId to the job queue as returned by ServiceSupport.getJobManager().

Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.notification Description

At a high level the Notification SDK supports the following functionality:
  • Receiving push notifications via GCM (in future to be expanded to SMS, and custom socket channel)
